item.title: Encrypting Secrets in NixOS Configurations
item.description: After playing around with NixOS and creating declarative configurations I quickly came across a need to provide encrypted secrets, rather than clear text. This is a requirement to be able to save configurations on GitHub and is recommended anyway, given that clear text secrets are made available on the world readable Nix store.
